content: can be imported into a spreadsheet. For this task, you must use a web browser to connect to an HMC. Environmental Dashboard The Enviromental Dashboard is new with the IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ It enhances the HMC Monitors Dashboard with system and partition level power consumption. The Environmental Dashboard displays:  System and LPAR power consumption  Real Time data access  Historical Trending Data  Exported data and reports Chapter 11. Environmentals 453 Figure 11-10 Environmental Dashboard display example 454 IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ Technical Guide © Copyright IBM Corp. 2023. All rights reserved. 455 Chapter 12. Performance This chapter describes the performance and capacity planning of IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ . This chapter includes the following topics:  12.1, “IBM z16 A02 and IBM z16 AGZ performance overview” on page 456  12.2, “IBM z16 Large System Performance Reference ratio” on page 457  12.3, “Fundamental components of workload performance” on page 459 
